comment: Love and support your race, my white brothers and sisters. Whites (European-descended peoples) are only % of the world's population. We have the right to exist and the right to our own ethno-states.
amr:
# ::snt Love and support your race, my white brothers and sisters. Whites (European-descended peoples) are only % of the world's population. We have the right to exist and the right to our own ethno-states.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (r / race
                        :poss (y / you)))
            :op2 (s / support-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 r))
      :snt2 (ii2 / include-91
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (w / white-02))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG1-of (p3 / populate-01
                        :ARG2 (w2 / world)))
            :ARG3 (p4 / percentage-entity
                  :mod (o / only)))
      :snt3 (r2 / right-05
            :ARG1 (w3 / we)
            :ARG2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e / exist-01
                        :ARG1 w3)
                  :op2 (r3 / right-05
                        :ARG1 w3
                        :ARG2 (s2 / state
                              :mod (e2 / ethics)
                              :poss w3)))))

comment: One love, one race. Humans. Multihued for certain. It all bleeds red.
